long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows users to simulate ongoing tournament results, explore potential outcomes, and analyze new team standings in real-time.
Has been tested with round robin tournament format specifically dota2 DPC. 
Support for more tournament formats planned. Stay tuned.
